comments:
Description: Exception is thrown out when dragging a template item into a grid.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a template file.
2. Add a label and changes it to a template item.
3. Add a grid.
4. Drag the label template into a grid cell.
5. Exception is thrown out.
